title: Honour Capsule rewards could be better
body:
OK so for starters, I'm honourable as ~~fuck~~ heck - I got mad honours before the honour system rework, and I haven't failed to reach honour level 5 in a season since it was reworked. I'm so honourable I get given key fragments practically for breathing, Riot throws them at me.
I've got at least 20 keys at any given time, and whenever I unlock a chest, Riot throws three more fragments my way.

I'm not even excited anymore when I get a level 5 honour capsule, because it's _always_ 270 blue essence, and 3 key fragments that I simply cannot use. 

A rework of how the honour capsules would do it for me, but if Rito is happy with that then I think we should be able to trade in key fragments for capsules - even at a rate of 10 fragments for one capsule would be delightful. That way at least I can get _something_ from them, rather than just stack them up for no reason.{{sticker:sg-janna}}
